channel.title: TMZ on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in TMZ on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: TMZ Issues Mea Culpa After Laughter Is Heard on Air During Coverage of Charlie Kirk’s Killing
item.description: Amid a tense climate, the news platform said the chuckling was unrelated to the conservative activist’s death but said it is sorry nevertheless.
